author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Bitcoin Miner IREN to Raise $450M From Convertible Debt Offering
description: The firm plans on using the proceeds to offset potential equity dilution and market risk.
content:
Bitcoin 
 and AI data center operator IREN plans to raise $450 million through a private sale of convertible senior notes, the company said in a press release.The notes, due in 2029, will be offered… [+1202 chars]
